itunes:title: This Is the Church Week 3 with Louie Giglio
title: This Is the Church Week 3 with Louie Giglio
description:
For week 3 of This Is the Church, Amanda and Raechel are joined by pastor and author, Louie Giglio. Together they continue to discuss and reflect on the metaphors found in this week’s reading about Christ and His Church. Join us as we celebrate the privilege of worshiping, serving, and living in the kingdom of God as we reflect the hope of Christ to the world.


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 3 of the She Reads Truth This Is the Church reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Title collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/this-is-the-church-week-3-with-louie-giglio
